page.title: 02Day in life of a farm boy.
page.content: {Day in the life of Michael Williams. My name is Michael Williams. I am 13 years old. I live at Slwch Farm which is 1.5 miles out of Brecon.It is a farm which consists of 250 acres. We have 500 sheep, 15 cows and 100 store cattle which we buy and fatten. Our farm house has 7 bedrooms, 2 big sheds and some old buildings for cattle and sheep. The busiest time of the year is lambing. This is what a normal day in spring is like. First I get up and check for any new born lambs. If so I pen them off separately. My next job is feeding the cattle. When that is finished I have breakfast. I then go to help my dad feed the sheep with cake. Other jobs include moving ewes and lambs and pitching. At about 11 o'clock at night I go and see if any lambs have come.
